data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Salto. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Salto, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Salto.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Salto.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Salto, Uruguay.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Federación
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Federación, Salto, Uruguay.
Father, please give the church in the state of Salto prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Salto, Uruguay. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, help the 9,111 believers in Salto to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

location.name: Salto
location.cities_list: Salto, Federación, Villa Constitución, Santa Ana, Belén
location.cities_list_w_pop: Salto (99,823), Federación (13,789), Villa Constitución (2,846), Santa Ana (2,059), Belén (2,033)
